title: The Best of the Dan Patrick Show
itunes:title: The Best of the Dan Patrick Show
description:
Covino and Rich fill in for Dan Patrick and the crew. They start out the show by trying to figure out why the Yankees have been playing bad baseball. Covino shares a request his daughter made. Plus, the guys put a spotlight on the New York Mets, specifically Rich starts looking ahead to the MLB playoffs and the conundrum he could find himself in with family, and more!

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
